Test.Comment:
some invalid case_expressions
testing datatypes char, char ascii, char ascii, varchar, varchar ascii, varchar, varchar2, date

Statement.CallString:
create table tab15n ( a1 character(300), a2 char(123) ascii, a3 char(515) ascii,
a4 varchar(253), a5 varchar(250) ascii, a6 varchar(452), a7 varchar2(224),
a8 date )

insert into tab15n values ( /* missing keyword end */ (case when 3 > 4 then 'false' else 'true' ), case when 't' > 'a' then 'true' else 'false' end, null, null, null, null, null, '1111-11-11 11:11:11.111111')

insert into tab15n values ( /* missing keyword else */ (case when 3 > 4 then 'false' 'true' end), case when 't' > 'a' then 'true' else 'false' end, null, null, null, null, null, '1111-11-11 11:11:11.111111')

insert into tab15n values ( /* else_value not given */ (case when 3 > 4 then 'false' else end), case when 't' > 'a' then 'true' else 'false' end, null, null, null, null, null, '1111-11-11 11:11:11.111111')
insert into tab15n values ( (case when 3 > 4 then 'false' else 'true' end), /* value not given */ case when 't' > 'a' then end, null, null, null, null, null, '1111-11-11 11:11:11.111111')

insert into tab15n values ( /* missing, invalid condition */ (case when 3 then 'false' else 'true' end), case when 't' > 'a' then 'true' else 'false' end, null, null, null, null, null, '1111-11-11 11:11:11.111111')

insert into tab15n values ( /* missing keyword 'when' */ (case 3 > 4 then 'false' else 'true' end), case when 't' > 'a' then 'true' else 'false' end, null, null, null, null, null, '1111-11-11 11:11:11.111111')

insert into tab15n values ( (case when 3 > 4 then 'false' else 'true' end), /* t and 3 are not comparable with > */ case when 't' > 3 then 'true' else 'false' end, null, null, null, null, null, '1111-11-11 11:11:11.111111')

insert into tab15n values ( (case when 3 > 4 then 'false' else 'true' end), /* tow times 'end' */ case when 't' > 'a' then 'true' else 'false' end end, null, null, null, null, null, '1111-11-11 11:11:11.111111')
